text: The Consular Division of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs will operate a stall at the INFOTEL-2017 Exhibition from 2nd to 5th November, from 8.00 a.m. to 6.00 p.m. at Block "C" of the Bandaranaike Memorial International Conference Hall (BMICH).The public can obtain consular services related to attestation of documents through the Electronic Document Attestation System (e-DAS) at this stall.Further information on the e-DAS could be obtained online at http://www.mfa.gov.lk/index.php/en/consular-services/authentication-of-documents-
title: Consular stall at INFOTEL-2017 Exhibition
